lines.text: Papa, Papa please tell me a bedtime story.
Papa will you please tel me a bedtime story?
Will you please be quiet? You'll wake up the other 2 boys.
I don't care about the other two boys.

[singing]
Now listen my children and you shall hear of the midnight ride of Paul Revere!
Why you don't mean the ride of Pa-aul Revere!
Yes, I mean the ride of Pa-aul Revere!
Who was Paul Revere? Are you kidding? Come over here son, now what happened in 1775?
Little fly upon the track, a train came along and broke his back.
Whoo whoo! Chugga chugga chugga chugga whoo whoo!
